quest1

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • quest1.Product
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DurableProduct, PerishableProduct

    public abstract class Product
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represents a Product. The class fields are: id, name, price, trademark, description and manufacture date.
    Version:
    19.09.2017
    Author:
    Shirley Ohara Telemaco de Freitas (shirleyohara@ufrn.edu.br)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Product()
      Method that crate an object to representes a book without parameters
      Product(int id, java.lang.String name, double price, java.lang.String trademark, java.lang.String description, java.util.Date manufactureDate)
      Method to build a object of the class Product.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product()

      • Product

        public Product(int id,
               java.lang.String name,
               double price,
               java.lang.String trademark,
               java.lang.String description,
               java.util.Date manufactureDate)
        Method to build a object of the class Product. It receives five parameters.
        Parameters:
        id - int - Parameter that represents the product id
        name - String - Parameter that represents the product name
        price - double - Parameter that represents the product price
        trademark - String - Parameter that represents the product trademark
        description - String - Parameter that represents the product description
        manufactureDate - Date - Parameter that represents the manufacture date of the product
